documents.document:
Advantages of LED vs. LCD TV

When LED TVs were first released they were claimed to have improved color gamut and saturation. It was said that because LEDs can produce a wider spectrum of white light, a more accurate range of color reproduction was possible. However whilst this might be true in the case LED backlit TVs that use arrays of RGB LEDs positioned directly behind the LCD panel, it is not necessarily the case for edge-lit LED lighting which is the method of lighting that the majority of LED TVs on the market employ. This is because the type of LEDs which produce this superior white light and are known as RGB LEDs, are only used in TVs with rear LED array configurations. Edge lit TVs use another type of LEDs called ‘white LEDs’ which do not share the superior qualities of RGB LEDs.LED Strips
Couple this with the fact that CCFL (fluorescent) technology has since improved over the same period and you will find that the performance of CCFL LCD TVs and edge-lit LED TVs is now very similar with regards to color reproduction.LED Strip Lights
Ultra thin design with Clear Motion 960 – Samsung’s highest rating for any of their TVs. Smart TV with Samsung Apps, Web Browser and QWERTY keyboard / remote. Massive discounts available if you know where to buy it!

As already mentioned there are other factors which also come in to consideration. One is that active 3D TVs benefit from the superior brightness and contrast of LED vs. LCD TV. This is because 3D TVs which use active shutter 3D TV glasses have the effect of dimming the display due to the filtering effect of the shutters built in to the glasses. The improved brightness of LED TV can compensate for this reduction of brightness in 3DTVs.

Other features such as auto brightness sensors and micro-dimming also affect the perceived brightness and contrast levels. When the room in which a TV with an auto-brightness sensor is located in is darkly lit, the TV reduces the brightness of the display. This improves the viewing experience and reduces power consumption. But whilst LED TVs characteristically have higher levels of brightness it is not necessarily always an advantage as fine detail can be lost when the brightness levels are too high – hence this why features such as auto-brightness and micro-dimming exist.

The fact of the matter is this, other features influence the quality of the picture produced more than LED lighting alone. A good LCD TV can produce better results in terms of picture quality than a bad LED TV and vice versa.

Energy Efficiency – LEDs are frequently touted are the eco-friendly TV. It is true that LED TVs use less power than both LCD and plasmas. If you believe the figures then LED TVs can use up to 40% less power than standard LCD TVs. I’m sure that if someone where to actually take the time to compare the power ratings for all LCD TV vs. LED TV currently on the market then the figure would not be anywhere near 40%.

Anyway, from a little research, what I can say is that owning a 60 inch LED TV will save the average owner approximately $50 per year in electricity costs compared to owning the equivalent 60 inch LCD TV. It might not be a large amount, but over the average LED TV lifespan it would approximately equal the extra cost for purchasing the LED versus LCD, meaning that the TV basically paying for itself.

Improved Reliability – There is no disputing that LED TVs have a longer life than CCFL LCD TVs, on average an LED TV will last about 30-50% than an LCD TV. This is because LEDs are more reliable than the fluorescent lamps in conventional LCD TVs. Depending on usage an LED should have a life of 10 years or more. Also the performance of fluorescent lamps degrades over time, the brightness and the whiteness of the light can be reduced by a considerable amount, a problem which is not present with LED lighting.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

LCD vs. LED TV

A topic frequently raised is the choice consumers face when deciding between LCD vs. LED TV. However there is no definitive answer as to which is type of TV is the best, like most choices your personal requirements will depend whether to opt for LED vs. LCD.LED Strips
The whole debate is somewhat confusing because of the fact that an LED TV is still technically speaking an LCD TV – all be it one that uses LED lighting to illuminate the LCD panel rather than CCFL (fluorescent lamps). Consumers who think that LED TVs are a radically different are misguided, although it is understandable why some people might have this misconception because some advertisers have portrayed LED TV technology in such a way which leaves consumers confused about its significance.LED Strip LightsHowever most consumers now appreciate that LED televisions are actually just LCD TVs that use LED backlighting rather than CCFL, and so now the term LED TV has simply become a convenient phrase use to distinguish them from conventional LCD TVs that use CCFLs. There are however some real and practical pros and cons between LCD vs. LED, and this is the issue that consumers are trying to get to the bottom of when deciding between LED TV vs. LCD TV.

In order to make a choice between the two variations of TV technology you need to understand these pros and cons and then prioritize the importance of each before making your decision.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

How to Make a Functional Lighting Store

How to make a functional lighting store and at the same time effectively? General lighting should be sufficient to ensure that when choosing merchandise and making purchases, the visitor will not feel discomfort. This is a top priority for most stores. At too low-light vision buyer will be constantly tense, why you may receive a feeling of discomfort. Today, as the average level of illumination, experts recommend choosing 1,500 at 1 m from the floor. Thus it is desirable to monitor the uniformity of illumination; in sight of a man should not be large differences of brightness and shade.LED Strips
It must take into account the qualitative characteristics of light - its color and hue. Color rendition - the ability to properly transmit light color - if possible should be high (greater than 90). Particularly stringent requirements for this parameter must be presented in the stores that sell goods, color nuances which are of fundamental importance: it is cosmetics, textiles, etc.LED Strip Lights
Using this source of low color may reduce the popularity of Buyers: daylight color product will differ from that which has been selected, and the person may be disappointed. It is important to follow and a color temperature of light determines its color.

Hue of light can influence the perception of the goods. The warm yellowish light (color temperature below 3200 K) relaxes, creates a tranquil atmosphere and cool light (more than 3500 K) has a stimulating effect. Lighting warm tones will find application in clothing stores, in grocery stores (such as in bread section). Cold light can illuminate the goods, which have elements of metal or glass.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

Led Economical Lighting

Although the choice of lamps that will illuminate store depends largely on the quality characteristics given by their light, one can not discount their value and energy efficiency. Practice shows that in most cases before the planners put to task to create a quality installation at a reasonable price, including operational costs.LED Strips
Paramount economical lighting system has to occupy a huge area supermarket. These spacious rooms with high ceilings and overall I floodlighting a good candidate for tubular fluorescent lamps. This choice will provide the necessary level of illumination without the high cost of electricity. The color rendering index for different models of modern lyuminestssntnyh lamps ranges from 70 to 90. Most frequently used lamps with color 80 - a compromise between price and quality. LED Strip Lights
In small shops, where the total cost of the light installation is much lower, the owner can not afford more expensive sources of light. General lighting can be provided by metal halide lamps. Their main advantage is - a large luminous flux. They | also have good color reproduction (on average, Ra> 90) and a wide range of color temperatures. It should be noted that for work / tubular fluorescent and metal halide many Lamont additional equipment required. This deficiency deprived of compact fluorescent lamps with standard socket E27 or E14, but using them to create more light is difficult: CFL light output is small. Therefore, they are usually used, to enhance the local light - for example, in an area where the cashier.
To local lighting is often used so-called Track I of the system. Attached to pot loch-: Mr. rail lamps can move freely and to target in any direction. Such a model is | especially useful in shops with a free plan, where you can move the counters and benches. Change of scene does not require replacement of lamps: it is enough to turn them in the right direction - and the counter will again be lit. Using the tracking system can increase the brightness in areas of the promotions.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

Special Led Lamps

To create accent lighting products and counters fit miniature halogen lamps. These light sources differ in almost absolute color. Light "galogenok" may be different color - from warm to cold. There are models of halogen lamps with reflector. This source creates a directed beam of light and is often used in those cases where you need to make a "thin" accent - select a small object.LED Strips
You can use them at the right time to increase or decrease the illumination in different parts of the store, focusing the attention of visitors to different groups of goods. Dimmirovat can be halogen and fluorescent tubes. LED Strip Lights
Require a special approach lighting stores that specialize in selling jewelry. It plays a major role is no longer common, and accent lighting, lighting and jewelry counters. The main task - to target the right sources to highlight the product, is to show it in all its glory. It can be used a small rotating halogen lights, fixed directly to the PA window. From one small generator, which can be placed in the back room, leaves tens of optical cables. At the end of each fiber can set different attachments that allow adjusting the intensity and width of the beam. Thus, each piece of jewelry can get individual lights. In this case, a visitor to see the lights themselves will not: thin optovolokno can easily hide, for example, at the counter. For accent light jewelry, clearance shelves and shop floor can use the compact and light-emitting diodes.

Led Exterior and Landscape Lighting

Properly chosen lighting gardening area allows you to create comfort in the garden near the house and create a unique lighting cottage. LED Strips
Currently, most of the leading manufacturers of equipment offers many variety of lighting fixtures for use in landscape design - from traditional lamps of different heights to the glass with face glowing, from the models placed in the ground (lighted up), to be piped into the trees. In addition, fixtures are made on the basis of standard incandescent bulbs and fluorescent lamps. LED Strip Lights
Garden lighting always begins with the tracks. It is lighted paths perform the main function of the system landscape lighting, providing the possibility to navigate in space and mark the path, so often light alleys, roads and trails are called functional, as opposed to decorative lighting landscape objects.

Modern lighting systems - it's not just a craze, but the decoration of the garden: they create a pleasant atmosphere in the evening and at night, make travel and recreation in the area comfortable and safe.

Scheduling fixtures are usually performed in the last stages of design and landscaping of country ownership, or on the basis of the finished project landscaping areas.

Led Office and Industrial Lighting

Most of the time modern man spends at work, so the coverage of offices throughout the world made to treat with special care. Indeed, in contrast to the residential premises or entertainment offices are marked not just the massive presence of people, but their tense hours of work. It is estimated that during the day office worker 10 000 times looks from the document at the keyboard or computer screen. However, the design office is not always first consider the location of fixtures, which can lead to the fact that employees will feel discomfort from lack of light, color distortion, flickering lamps, and high temperatures generated by lighting equipment. LED Strips
Every other office staff sooner or later becomes the owner of the so-called "eye syndrome, which arises because of constant fatigue. Quality office lighting should be closer to the performance of daylight. It is recommended to cover office fluorescent or energy saving lamps white shade. Yellowish tint of energy saving lamps and incandescent lamps promotes relaxation and can be used when covering recreation areas. LED Strip Lights
According to the International Commission on Illumination, thanks to improved room lighting can increase employee productivity by 3-11%. But this should be done properly to not get the opposite effect. How to achieve the same result? First of all, the lighting should be emphasized functional. In this light should organically fit into the surroundings, matching style of interior design in general,
The main objective of the lighting system - is to create ideal conditions for vision, in which most effectively can be performed a variety of processes. Office lighting should provide an easy and accurate detection of the smallest detail, whether on paper or on screen.

It is difficult to imagine a modern office without a computer. However, the monitor is very vulnerable to the glare. Glare can be caused by bright lighting elements, strongly illuminated surface or ill-placed windows. The only light that does not gives glare - fluorescent. That is why they are used to illuminate the screen with a deficiency of another world. With regard to lighting of industrial premises, with a lack of natural light and the combined use of artificial lighting, in which the lack of standards of natural illumination supplemented artificially.

Good Light

When illuminated jewelry is necessary to consider what material they are made. Yellow gold will come to life under the warm light, while silver and white gold light like the cold tones. Diamonds will look favorably at metal halide lighting high color temperature (such as a light to punch through a stone); supplemented by low-power light halogen lamps (they highlight the face of stone and make them play). When designing a lighting store to remember and pitfalls. For example, in the spectrum of metal halide and halogen lamps have a small share of disastrous for organic substances by ultraviolet radiation. When exposed to light these lamps products may fade, fade. Therefore, in the stores selling clothes, fabrics, art and expensive things just for lighting with lamps should install filters that block ultraviolet light. LED Strips
It is equally important to take care about the comfort of customers for which you want to ensure that no glare - ie, eye contact direct or reflected from the glossy surface of the beams. Direct light low placed a lamp, not equipped with an extra nozzle (diffuser, hood or grille), can be a serious under-mehoy for a man who came to shop. It is also desirable to follow and in the absence of very bright glare on the mirror or glass surfaces - this is especially important in showrooms or stores that sell housewares. Metal Halide sources while working extremely hot, and raising the temperature inside the room. It is dangerous for goods not tolerate high temperatures. In addition, the frequent situations where the shop staff, not withstanding the constant heat loads on their own off of the lamps, thereby breaking the light concept store. Bearing in mind that points, the air conditioning system design facilities to simultaneously with the light. If the ventilation conditions can not be improved, it is recommended to replace the "hot" lights on "cold" - using fluorescent light. Practice shows that a universal approach to lighting shops there. In each case, much depends on the customer and designer. LED Strip Lights

Led Residential lighting

Since ancient times, light is associated with comfort, security, reliability, it gives strength and joy. Therefore, man instinctively seeks to fill the apartment with light. This not only saves you from damp, bad smells, depressed mood, but also improve the health and mood. LED Strips
Specialists of feng shui, for example, believe that the home environment has on city dwellers a huge impact. Good Feng Shui would be present in the interior, where the positive energy as saturates rights. Because of this people succeed in life and can easily overcome the situation, dangerous for health. LED Strip LightsIt is important that your home was well lighted, both inside and outside. The play of light and shade, sparkle of sunlight and glare glass enliven any room. Should not limit yourself to one single-chandelier on the ceiling - use colored lights, wall lights. But do not get carried away by color: the use of more than three colors of lights will create the effect of color chaos. Tinge of energy saving lamps and incandescent lamps promotes relaxation, which makes them preferable in light interior bedroom or dining room.

Domestic lighting is not limited to an urban apartment, all the above can be attributed to the coverage of holiday cottages. Here, for the owners of bathhouses, we recommend that you use lamps with a high degree of protection from moisture - so-called light "sauna", specially designed to work in a wet environment.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

Led Cabinet Lighting

As for cabinet lighting or just the table where, for example, the child makes the lessons here are more suitable for energy-saving lamp white shade, providing natural daylight without a flash. However, despite the advantages of energy saving lamps, as a long life, even light, can use them instead of conventional incandescent bulbs, do not use energy-saving bulbs in places where the light is switched on for a short time (bathroom, closet, bathroom). LED Strips
But the lamps and fixtures - is not only a source of light, they can play an important role in the design of the apartment. We all know that many homes walls and doorways are far from perfectly smooth. It can be hidden with the help of properly placed lighting fixtures. To create a sense of height with a relatively low ceiling, you can use wall lights with light directed upwards. Too bright lighting is not conducive to comfort and relaxation, to address this problem recommend using circuit breakers with adjustable or lower power lights. LED Strip Lights
Unlimited possibilities for decorative lighting of rooms and corridors provide spotlights. Decorative "point" will displace the emphasis on the original decision of the interior, highlight the wall cabinet, or create a pattern on the ceiling.

Led Industrial Lighting

Industrial lighting shall ensure the absence of a field of view of working hard shadows, which can distort the size and shape of objects and thereby increases fatigue and reduces productivity. Shadows should be mitigated by applying, for example, lamps with light-diffusing opal glass, and under natural light using shading devices (blinds, shutters, canopies, etc.). LED Strips
On a design artificial lighting can be of two types - general and combined. System is used for general lighting in rooms where the entire area of the same type of work performed (casting, welding, electroplating circuit), as well as in administrative, clerical and warehouse facilities. Here distinguish the general uniform illumination (the light is distributed evenly throughout the floor area) and localized general lighting (including the location of jobs). LED Strip Lights
When performing precision visual works (jewelry, metalwork, turning, controlling) in places where the equipment creates deep, sharp shadows or work surfaces are arranged vertically (punches, guillotines), along with the general use local lighting.

Fluctuations of light in the workplace, resulting, for example, a sharp change in voltage, determine peread aptatsiyu eyes, leading to significant fatigue. The constancy of light in time stabilization is achieved by a floating voltage, rigid mounting fixtures, the use of special schemes include HID lamps.

But the variety of industrial lighting fixtures is not limited to the interior. This also includes street lights.

Germicidal lamps are used for air disinfection, drinking water, household items, food, blood transfusion stations, children and school facilities and production facilities of industrial enterprises. Signal lights to indicate output, safe evacuation routes, fixing the boundaries of hazard zones as conditionally assign to the industry.

Modern Led Electric Lamps

Today, traditional, we are all aware evolved a bulb so that it sometimes difficult to know her ancestor - the lamp of Edison. Lamps of the new millennium do not have to compete with other light sources. But this does not mean that manufacturers are in place. The emergence of the new types and kinds of lamps is not a whim of designers and manufacturers. Their imagination is fueled by consumer demands. Light sources are needed for different types of lighting, different premises, different, often unusual forms of lamps. Since the lamps of bygone days did not differ diversity in them, regardless of destination, used mostly traditional incandescent bulbs. Once it had convenient for everybody.LED Strips

Now the market situation has changed radically. In a flat or intricately curved lampshade our good old incandescent bulb simply will not fit. In a luxurious crystal chandelier, it will look like something out of place, though so much time and effort was spent in selecting a suitable lamp, which, according to your plan, among other things also have to decorate the interior. What to do? LED Strip Lights

Diversity and high consumer quality light bulbs that now we can buy in the shops, just imagination! First of all, no one is going to abandon the traditional incandescent bulbs. Yes, they have disadvantages, and significant. Firstly, they are uneconomical, since a significant portion of energy transferred into heat: the production of light takes only 5-10% of energy consumption - then the premise basically is not covered and heated. Secondly, they quickly burn out. But at the same time, their pleasant soft light is able to create a homelike atmosphere, making our holiday after a busy day of calm and complete.

http://www.ledlightprice.com

Installing Spotlights In the Suspended Ceiling

Spotlights mounted in a specially prepared stand. This stand consists of a ring and two or three feet. The ring, which will keep the lamp, should be made of heat resistant material, as when using Halogen lamps, it can experience significant temperature changes that can deform the ring. It should be remembered that use halogen or incandescent lamps of high power in the spotlights in ceilings is not worth it. Power halogen bulbs in the lamp should not exceed 35 Tues to protect the film from the burning ceiling used one or several insulating rings. The rings are made of heat resistant plastic master directly under the concrete lamp with all its features. Properly manufactured termokoltso creates a small gap between the lamps housing (1-1.5 mm) and provides maximum stealth. LED Strips
In some types of fixtures, this may lead to the fact that the inner space of the ceiling will be highlighted. Get rid of this effect is possible using fluorescent or LED lamps, body which is usually made of metal and does not transmit light into the interior of a stretch ceiling. In addition, LED and fluorescent lamps have two important advantages: low power consumption and little heat. Our company offers not only lamps in bulk, but also energy-saving lamps Recessed lighting.LED Strip Lights

LED Traffic Lights

Traffic lights are a day in the big city to maintain traffic order of the important tools. But perhaps there are many existing defects in the traffic lights, or traffic lights are a better vision of the future, designers of traffic signals and time to do a redesign. This from the designer Gisung Han, Hwanju Jeon & Jaemin Lee designed the new solar lights, dedicated to maintaining the order of the sidewalk. LED Strips
Designer "tree" and "traffic light" are two things not related to the collection together, saying it was linked to the traffic lights in the trees. "Tree lights," mainly by the trees, LED lights and solar panels constitute, LED lights installed directly on the trunk to indicate traffic signal, the red and green signal by the wireless device control, and solar panels are on the whole equipment supply. LED Strip Lights
The introduction from the design point of view, the starting point of this is to the traffic lights better and ecological urban landscape, easy to install, easy to identify, can be directly installed in any one tree, without the need to establish a cement pole separately or iron, not only achieve the purpose of cost savings, but also reflect the energy-saving environmental protection, ideal for construction of towns and villages of the traffic. But this requires that each junction must have been grown plant trees on, or are restricted.

Scientists closer to creating a green LED

LED color depends on the type of semiconductor in it. Modern production is subject production of red and blue LEDs. We'll just create a green LED so that you can, by combining them with red and blue, get any color. However, this proved more difficult than originally imagined scientists. By modifying a red orange LED was created, and by adding phosphorus to the blue was obtained white. Green is with sufficient force to produce the glow has not yet succeeded. LED Strips
Specialists Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute are one step closer to creating an effective green LEDs. They did this by etched patterns on the nanoscale interface layer between the sapphire and the LED base layer of gallium nitride, which gives it a green color. As a result, was able to significantly increase the force of the emission and the internal efficiency of LEDs. According to researchers, if they manage to follow through, not far off the appearance of energy-efficient LED displays. LED Strip Lights
A total of 102 lamp set of powerful white LEDs. 84 LEDs are used for the reflected light (they emit at the ceiling), 18 LEDs provide direct illumination of the desktop. The light output lamp is 60 lumens / watt. Lamp equipped with modern means of energy conservation: built-in presence detection sensor and natural light (luminous flux can be smoothly reduced when enough daylight in the workplace).

http://www.ledlightprice.com

LED Expo

The International Exhibition of LED solutions, chips and equipment for their production LEDTechExpo 2011 will take place Roundtable "LED production in Russia - the road map. " LED Strips
Organizers of the event: ROSNANO, Noncommercial Partnership of Producers of LEDs and systems based on them, PRIMEXPO. Roadmap "Use of nanotechnology in the manufacture of LEDs," forms the basic directions of development of LED technology, based on which will develop research (R & D) and define future projects. This card is subject to regular renewal. Part of the upgrade process is to discuss the main achievements and directions of development at round tables. The purpose of these activities is to determine the immediate needs R & D at present, as well as to formulate the basic designs to bring to market solid-state lighting products. LED Strip Lights
Annual planning process
Roundtables conducted RUSNANO in 2009 and 2010, are steps in the annual process of updating the road map. In March 2011
RUSNANO signed an agreement on joint accompanied by a roadmap with industry associations - Nonprofit Partnership Manufacturers of LEDs, and systems based on them. At the round table April 20, 2011, held within the business program LEDTechExpo, will discuss proposals for the improvement of the Roadmap.

Proposals for discussion of priority setting
The proposal to update the maps prepared by the Secretary of the Technical Committee of the roadmap lists the main tasks for LEDs and OLEDs.

Task of developing new products to the LEDs have resulted from a complete review and revision of the structure problem for the road map. Need to consider each task in order to determine its priority in the coming year. Based on discussions by the Technical Committee will prepare an updated version of the roadmap. Results will be published.

Brighter LED

We should have lights that shine brighter and last longer. And these lamps are! Using krypton lamp brightness increases by 10% compared with the conventional and silicified interior surface of the bulb gives a soft, no glare. Improved lamp can endure the shocks and tremors due to the additional holders of the helix. In the fight for consumer boldly entered fluorescent and halogen lamps, the advantage of these lamps is that for the same power consumption, they provide two to three times more light and serve three to four times longer. When electricity prices are increasing, only one solution - to reduce costs, this will help to halogen lamps, which can save up to 80% of electricity and will be an important source of savings. LED Strips
In addition, they have more natural color reproduction, and small size, a real godsend to designers: do not need wires with large cross section and large chucks. Fluorescent lamps can produce light, the spectrum of such a daycare. Until recently in Russia, such lamps in the home were used rarely. This was due to the peculiarities of our economic situation. Then the electricity was relatively cheap, and lamps, whose production is based on high technologies, pricey. In addition, they require the stability characteristics of the electric current in the network. LED Strip Lights
http://www.ledlightprice.com

A new generation of LED Lamps

Lately, we all think more about that light in the house was larger, and we would pay less for electricity. A new generation of fluorescent lamps will help us to solve this difficult problem, since they run quickly and without blinking, do not flicker, give a bright even light, and are twice as long as its predecessors. LED StripsSavings can be achieved and by lowering the flux. It often happens that evening bright light is needed only for a few minutes - find the book, read a television program. And in the rest of the time calm enough darker lighting. Previously, such changes would require at least two lamps, and now, only one lamp. If you turn it off, and then in three seconds back on, the brightness will drop by 50% and power consumption will decrease. Here it is - the real source of savings. LED Strip Lights
The modern market fixtures allow giving more attention to the design of the room. And in this issue are no trifles. The lamp should also look beautiful. And to replace a boring monotonous forms coming teardrop-shaped, svecheobraznye, cylindrical and pear-shaped bulb. And then there's the lamp-tube, teardrop-shaped lamp with a conical dome lamp globes. Integrated into the interior of a bedroom lamp, which does not need a lamp shade.
